Package com.google.auto.value.extension.serializable.serializer

Class SerializerFactoryLoader

java.lang.Object
com.google.auto.value.extension.serializable.serializer.SerializerFactoryLoader
public final class SerializerFactoryLoader extends Object
Builds a SerializerFactory populated with discovered SerializerExtension instances.
